summary: Access to health care is critical for veterans, particularly those living in rural areas. The Veterans Health Administration's Office of Rural Health funds research and initiatives aimed at improving the health of veterans living in rural areas. In 2022, ORH supported 120 research projects. But it informs researchers of funding opportunities via word-of-mouth and existing relationships, leaving some researchers potentially unaware. Also, ORH knows what...
title: VA Health Care: Office of Rural Health Would Benefit from Improved Communication and Developing Performance Goals
